com.smartthings.sdk.client.methods

Interface ScenesApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApiClient.Api

    public interface ScenesApi
extends ApiClient.Api

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ScenesApi.ListScenesQueryParams
      A convenience class for generating query parameters for the listScenes method in a fluent style.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StandardSuccessResponse executeScene(java.lang.String authorization, java.lang.String locationId, java.lang.String sceneId)
      Execute Scene Execute a Scene by id for the logged in user and given locationId
      ScenePagedResult listScenes(java.lang.String authorization, java.lang.String locationId, java.lang.Integer max, java.lang.Integer offset)
      List Scenes Fetch a list of Scenes for the logged in user and given locationId
      ScenePagedResult listScenes(java.lang.String authorization, java.lang.String locationId, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> queryParams)
      List Scenes Fetch a list of Scenes for the logged in user and given locationId Note, this is equivalent to the other listScenes method, but with the query parameters collected into a single Map parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • executeScene

        StandardSuccessResponse executeScene(java.lang.String authorization,
                                     java.lang.String locationId,
                                     java.lang.String sceneId)
        Execute Scene Execute a Scene by id for the logged in user and given locationId
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        locationId - The ID of the location. (required)
        sceneId - The ID of the Scene. (required)
        Returns:
        StandardSuccessResponse

      • listScenes

        ScenePagedResult listScenes(java.lang.String authorization,
                            java.lang.String locationId,
                            java.lang.Integer max,
                            java.lang.Integer offset)
        List Scenes Fetch a list of Scenes for the logged in user and given locationId
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        locationId - The ID of the location. (required)
        max - The max number of items to return (optional)
        offset - The index where the list of items should start (optional)
        Returns:
        ScenePagedResult

      • listScenes

        ScenePagedResult listScenes(java.lang.String authorization,
                            java.lang.String locationId,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> queryParams)
        List Scenes Fetch a list of Scenes for the logged in user and given locationId Note, this is equivalent to the other listScenes method, but with the query parameters collected into a single Map parameter. This is convenient for services with optional query parameters, especially when used with the ScenesApi.ListScenesQueryParams class that allows for building up this map in a fluent style.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        locationId - The ID of the location. (required)
        queryParams - Map of query parameters as name-value pairs

        The following elements may be specified in the query map:

        • max - The max number of items to return (optional)
        • offset - The index where the list of items should start (optional)
        Returns:
        ScenePagedResult
